detail_desc: Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in a crêpe weave with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front, zip in one side and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Set with a bodysuit, shorts and hat in organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Shorts with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Hat with an all-over print and ears.
Padded footmuff in woven fabric with a hood with narrow elastication around the edge, and concealed zips down the front. Fleece lining. Size 87x104 cm. 2-3.5 Tog.
Skirts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and a wide, elasticated hem. Medium support. The polyester content of the sports bra is recycled.
Thin sports trousers in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and jersey sections at the hems.
Metal stud earrings in different colours.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in hard-washed cotton jersey with pleating at the front and a decorative seam centre back.
Short shorts in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an elasticated waist and side pockets.
Open jacket in airy, dobby-weave viscose with dropped shoulders, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a pompom trim at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Lace body with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a high cut at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight legs.
Top in washed linen with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck front and back, and buttons down the front.

Push-up triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened straight or crossed at the back. Adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved Henley shirts in soft jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short, frill-trimmed sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved hoodie in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front, double-layered hood and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low, V-shaped waist and high cut at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a soft, textured organic cotton knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a linen and cotton weave with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slightly shorter legs with creases and turn-ups at the hems. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Body in microfibre and lace with a firm sculpting effect on the waist. Mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support, adjustable shoulder straps and a lined gusset with press-studs. Medium coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly.
Fitted off-the-shoulder top in sturdy crêpe jersey with long sleeves and a partially sewn-in foldover top.

Strapless balconette bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening and silicone trim at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Top in viscose jersey with short, flounced sleeves and a straight hem with short slits in the sides.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a lace collar and a tie at the neck and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and embroidery at the cuffs and hem.
Short, wide dress in a viscose crêpe weave. Round, lace-trimmed neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties at the front, short sleeves and gathered, lace-trimmed seams on the skirt. Unlined.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Slip-on trainers in patterned cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. No lacing. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline, long sleeves, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ballet pumps with appliqués on the front, elastic straps over the foot and a grosgrain trim at the top. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Metal earrings with fabric fringes.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back, and a wide lace trim at the hem.
Poncho-cut dress in printed viscose jersey with a drawstring at the waist and sewn-together sides with armholes at the top.
Cargo trousers in washed stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with a concealed press-stud. Tapered legs with shaped knees and elasticated hems.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Shorts in woven fabric. High waist with belt loops where the front ones can be unfastened, a zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and wide legs.
Derby shoes in shiny leather with lacing at the top and gently rounded toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 3.5 cm.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.

Fitted jacket in fast-drying functional fabric designed to help keep you dry and cool while exercising. Hood, zip down the front with a chin guard and zipped front pockets for safe storage of valuables. Extra-long sleeves with thumbholes to help keep you warm while exercising outside. The sleeves are in a raglan cut to minimise the risk of friction from the seams.
T-shirts in organic cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline. One with raglan sleeves.

Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and embroidery at the top and back. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cable-knit jumper in lightweight cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, narrow sides and a high cut at the back.
Top in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, wide, pleated sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Underwired lace bras with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and zip fly with a button. Diagonal side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and skinny legs with seams.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket is made from partly recycled polyester.
Boots in waterproof imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, padded edge and hook and loop fastening at the front, Pile linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.

Lined, bandeau bikini top with side support and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Jumper in a soft knit with a slightly wider neckline and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted, knee-length dress in stretch viscose jersey with long sleeves and a seam at the waist with a decorative knot detail. Unlined.

Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband, an opening for the heels, and anti-slip protectors on the bottom of the feet.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels with a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket with a contrasting colour lining that can be used as a handkerchief, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim Fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Socks in a jacquard-knit cotton blend supplied in a transparent plastic Christmas tree bauble.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Sandals with open sides and toes and crossover straps at the front. Imitation leather insoles.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Calf-length trousers in soft, ribbed viscose jersey. High waist with covered elastication and straight, wide legs.
V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with short, lace-trimmed sleeves. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.

Shirt in soft, brushed cotton twill with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Two flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Sleeveless, knee-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Tasselled ties at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem. Unlined.

High-waisted jeans in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, decorative, V-shaped seam at the top, zip fly with buttons, side and back pockets and tapered legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
